task.title: Installing the DITA For Publishers Package

context.p: The DITA For Publishers materials are provided as a single Zip package from the project's download page: . The Toolkit plugins should work with both the 1.4.3 and 1.5 versions of the Open Toolkit. However, DITA 1.2-specific features (e.g., keyref), are only supported by the 1.5 version of the Toolkit.

step.cmd: Download the Zip package and unpack it wherever you like, e.g. c:\myprojects\dita4publishers.

stepresult.p:
You should get these directories and zip files:
dita4publishers_toolkit_plugins.zip Contains the DITA for Publishers Toolkit plugins. To be installed in your local Open Toolkit's plugins directory.
documentation Contains the project documentation (DITA format).
epubs Contains ePub electronic books generated from the sample publications in sample_data
sample_data Contains sample publications and related data that serve to demonstrate and test the Publishing specializations.
xslt Contains various XSLT transforms that might be useful, mostly used to convert Project Gutenberg sample data into publications (the XSLTs used by plugins are in the plugins as packaged).

step.cmd: Unzip the file dita4publishers_toolkit_plugins into your local Open Toolkit's plugins directory so that each top-level directory in the Zip file is a direct child of plugins.

stepresult.p:
Your plugins directory should include these DITA for Publishers plugin directories:
net.sourceforge.dita4publishers.doctypes
net.sourceforge.dita4publishers.epub
net.sourceforge.dita4publishers.pubmap.html
net.sourceforge.dita4publishers.xmldomain.doctypes
net.sourceforge.dita4publishers.xmldomain.html
